gw.api.databuilder

Class TransactionBuilder<T extends Transaction,B extends TransactionBuilder<T,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder<T,B>
      • gw.api.databuilder.CCDataBuilder<T,B>
        • gw.api.databuilder.TransactionBuilder<T,B>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueGenerator<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PaymentBuilder, RecoveryBuilder, RecoveryReserveBuilder, ReserveBuilder

    public abstract class TransactionBuilder<T extends Transaction,B extends TransactionBuilder<T,B>>
extends CCDataBuilder<T,B>
    Abstract supertype of builders for the 4 types of financial transactions in ClaimCenter. Use the subtype builders directly: PaymentBuilder, ReserveBuilder, RecoveryBuilder, RecoveryReserveBuilder.

    Notes:

    • To set the Amount of the transaction, use withLineItem().
    • You must call withStatus() to set the Status on the transaction. When create() is called, this method sets up the taccounts for the transaction given its status and other fields.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder

        DEFAULT_ORDER

      • onTransactionSet

        public B onTransactionSet(TransactionSet set)
        Defines which transaction set this transaction should be place into

      • onTransactionSet

        public B onTransactionSet(ValueGenerator<? extends TransactionSet> set)
        Sets the TransactionSet on this transaction, and also links the transactionset to this transaction's claim. If the transactionset does not already have a claim, its claim will be set to the transaction's claim. If multiple TransactionBuilders call onTransactionSet() on the same transactionset, only the first such call will set the claim on the transactionset (if it did not already have one).
        Parameters:
        set - the TransactionSet to link this transaction to
        Returns:
        TransactionBuilder with its TransactionSet set

      • withComments

        public B withComments(java.lang.String comments)
        Add a comment to the transaction

      • withLineItem

        public B withLineItem(CurrencyAmount transAmount,
                      java.lang.String comment,
                      LineCategory category)
        Adds a TransactionLineItem to the transaction. Use this to set the transaction's amount(s).

      • withReserveLine

        public B withReserveLine(ReserveLine reserveLine)
        Sets the ReserveLine of the transaction. This also sets its Exposure, CostType, CostCategory, and ReservingCurrency

      • withStatus

        public B withStatus(TransactionStatus status)
        Sets the Status of the transaction entity, and also updates TAccounts to match that status. Calling this method is required to setup TAccounts correctly on a new transaction for test. Make sure the transaction Status agrees with the approval status of its transaction set, and with the Status of its Check, if the transaction is a payment.
